features.title: Dashboard
features.description: View your personal dashboard with overview of recent activities, upcoming events, and quick actions

features.description: View and manage your personal action items, tasks, and to-do list

features.description: View and track sandwich collection records from hosts

features.description: Record a new sandwich collection from a host

features.description: Manage host facilities that provide sandwiches for collection

features.description: Register a new host facility for sandwich collections

features.description: Manage drivers and assign them to collection routes

features.description: Manage volunteer profiles, skills, availability, and assignments

features.description: Create a new volunteer profile with contact information and skills

features.title: Projects
features.description: View and manage long-term projects and initiatives

features.title: Create New Project
features.description: Start a new project or initiative

features.title: Meetings
features.description: Schedule and manage team meetings with agendas and notes

features.description: Create and manage sandwich distribution event requests

features.description: Request a new sandwich distribution event

features.title: Event Reminders
features.description: Manage automated reminders for upcoming events

features.title: Team Chat
features.description: Communicate with your team in real-time channels

features.title: Inbox
features.description: View your personal message inbox

features.title: Suggestions Portal
features.description: Submit and view suggestions for improvement

features.title: Team Board
features.description: Collaborate with sticky notes on the team board

features.description: View impact metrics and analytics dashboards

features.description: Track performance metrics for grant reporting

features.description: View weekly status dashboard and monitoring
